Translations.Text: 'in hdha alquran aladhi nazal ealaa muhamad laquran eazim almnafe, kthyr alkhyr, ghzyr alelm, fi kitab masun mstwr ean 'aeyun alkhlq, wahu alkitab aldhy bi'aydi almlayk. la yamass alquran 'iilaa almalayikat alkiram aladhin thrhm allah min alafat waldhnwb, wala yamassuh aydana 'iilaa almtthrwn min alshirk waljnabt walhdth
